hackathon-description-text: 2015 IS THE YEAR OF THE VIDEO.
hackathon-requirements: All hacks must be functional and must contain at least 1 of the sponsoring APIs.
hackathon-rules: All participants in Video Hack Day must abide by the following rules. Anyone who breaks these rule will be ineligible for prizes and may not be allowed to present their hack.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: $250 to the charity of your choice
In honor of the holiday, the hack that is the most Mother's Day themed will win a special prize!

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=902 Broadway, New York, NY 10010, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: On a technical level, how impressive is this hack?
How outside the box is the hack?
How novel is this hack? Is it pushing the boundaries?
Could this app be turned into a real business?
How nice is the user experience?

hackathon-description-header: 2015 is the year of the video!
